https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/a2Uni1EN6lASK3Wx4fWDxMGuK63.jpg After thirty-three years, Stanley and Emily are finally closing down their mom and pop corner store, which happens to be a porno shop. When a customer drops in to make a purchase, they regale him with stories of the old days and recall the good times as they pack up their singular merchandise. A World of Pleasure
